name: event-notification-subscription
description: Defines a subscription for event notifications in BACnet, specifying the recipient and notification preferences.

fields.name: recipient
fields.description: The recipient to receive event notifications.

fields.name: process-identifier
fields.description: A unique identifier for the subscribing process.

fields.name: issue-confirmed-notifications
fields.description: Indicates whether confirmed event notifications should be issued to the recipient.

fields.name: time-remaining
fields.description: The remaining time in seconds before this subscription expires.
